main event: A 17-year-old boy in Union City, Indiana reported seeing three round lights in the sky above him at around 10:20 PM on November 3, 1965.
interesting points: The boy was driving home from basketball practice when he first saw the three lights.
He stopped his car and got out to observe the lights, which were about 300 feet in the air directly above him.
The boy had the impression that the object was from the surrounding area and had been there during the past month.
A local policeman called to report the boy's sighting to the Air Force's Project Blue Book.
The Air Force responded by asking the witness to complete an AFTO Form 164 to provide more information about the sighting.
sighted object: three round lights in the sky
photographs: no photographs were included in the report
